dropDownItems.name: Virtualization & Storage
dropDownItems.info: Duologik offers server virtualization and shared storage solutions that put your organization in an ideal position for future growth. Server virtualization prevents server sprawl, leading to poor hardware resource utilization, possible breach in software security and high electricity and cooling costs.  Stop technology wastage, increase your availability and manage your cost.

dropDownItems.name: Nimble Storage
dropDownItems.info: HPE Nimble Storage has set the bar for disrupting, simplifying, and modernizing storage to help customers accelerate their digital transformation. Today the innovation continues. Nimble Storage customers now have an enhanced platform that turbocharges apps, eliminates disruptions, and drives more IT agility.

dropDownItems.name: All Flash Array
dropDownItems.info: As the world steams along its path toward a digital economy and businesses transition from datadependent to data-driven, the demands placed on storage performance continue to escalate. With performance increasing at less than one-third the rate of capacity, disk technology, the foundation of non-human memory and the workhorse of the datacentre, seems to be headed out to a much-deserved pasture.

dropDownItems.name: Converged Infrustructure
dropDownItems.info: You want to deploy applications faster. You want to deliver IT capacity to your business and services to your customers more quickly and easily. And you want a shorter time-to-value for IT investments. Virtualization is a well-understood technology that can help you increase agility, reduce costs, and simplify IT management. But virtualization is not ”just another technology.”

dropDownItems.name: Product Fulfillment
dropDownItems.info: Duologik’s IT procurement services enable customers to source, warehouse, configure, test and ship hardware and software nationally.  We work with your budget to meet the specification, brand quality and delivery schedules for successful project deployments.  Our team negotiates directly with vendors for the best possible prices

dropDownItems.name: Networking
dropDownItems.info: With the explosion of employees bringing their own devices to the office, you can see the benefits of implementing wireless and wired networks into your organization. To maintain productivity, it is important for employees to have access to the corporate network by giving them wireless access from their own devices.

dropDownItems.name: Infrustructure as a Service
dropDownItems.info: Duologik’s competitive, on-demand Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) with instant provision of services essentially simplifies data center complexity and improve customers’ ability to deliver their unpredictable computing requirement in a rapid and cost-effective manner.

dropDownItems.name: Private Cloud
dropDownItems.info: We incorporate proven elastic cloud infrastructure and our decades of managed operations experience delivering a secure, private, custom solution addressing the most demanding businesses challenges.

dropDownItems.name: Cloud Backup
dropDownItems.info: Organizations have traditionally implemented proper Disaster Recovery (DR) practice by writing backups to tape and shipping them offsite.  This is a costly and complex system owing to hardware and personnel requirements. Duologik’s Cloud backup system eliminates these requirements ensuring backups are secure and up-to-date.

dropDownItems.name: Software as a Service
dropDownItems.info: Increasing employee productivity with available technology has never been easier and it can be made possible with low-cost investment, and high flexibility. Explore how Duologik’s Software as a Service (SaaS) unlocks the potential of workers, empowers business managers and enables CEOs to make informed decisions in real time with faster technology deployment

dropDownItems.name: Infrustructure as a Service
dropDownItems.info: Duologik’s competitive, on-demand Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) with instant provision of services essentially simplifies data center complexity and improve customers’ ability to deliver their unpredictable computing requirement in a rapid and cost-effective manner.

dropdowns.name: IT Services
dropdowns.des: SOLVING COMPLEX BUSINESS PROBLEMS WITH IT SOLUTIONS

dropDownItems.name: Professional Services
dropDownItems.info: Duologik Infrastructure Consulting Services takes a holistic, adaptive approach that simplifies the IT modernization process. Equally important, we help prepare your people, processes and organization for change. You get more agility, lower costs and greater flexibility to better pursue your business goals.

dropDownItems.name: Data Managment
dropDownItems.info: In order to stay competitive organization’s success relies heavily on its ability to manage its information. You need fast access to your data in a cost effective manner. Data management involves more than the technology. A holistic approach coordinates people, business process, and technological innovation.

dropDownItems.name: Troubleshooting
dropDownItems.info: We solve common problems, errors and have a framework to systemically drill down in intense deliberation for complex uncertainties. Sources of intractable problems can be uncovered and fixed in our ISO lab testing environment.
